Package com.sensorstack.devicelayer

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BluetoothService
    This class does all the work for setting up and managing Bluetooth connections with other devices.
    DeviceLayerActivity
    This class is used for connection establishment of android device with the sensor hardware depending on the mode of connectivity.
    DeviceLayerClass
    This class facilitates data exchange between the android device and sensor hardware over a dedicated channel created during the connection establishment phase.
    DeviceListActivity
    This Activity appears as a dialog.
    Mode
    Encapsulates parameters for defining and identifying various supported mode of connection with the hardware.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ModeNotSupportedException
    Exception thrown when particular mode of connection with the hardware is not supported
    NoDeviceConnectedException
    Exception thrown if no hardware device is connected to query
